backend/main.mo: Actor implements admin RBAC bootstrap, user profile storage, and contact form submission handling using AccessControl and Map structures.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module resets the firstAdminBootstrapped flag to false during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of various frontend files describing UI components, hooks, styles, and content modules.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production environment variable file showing optional build metadata fields for the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based color variables, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app and preloading the hero background image.
frontend/PRODUCTION_CONFIGURATION.md: Documentation for production admin access flow, RBAC behavior, and first‑time admin bootstrap instructions.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Guidelines for building and deploying the application to production, including draft vs live explanation and prerequisites.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json: IC asset configuration specifying well-known files with explicit cache settings.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: List of approved domains for IC domain verification.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Defines alternative origins allowed for Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Production smoke test checklist validating landing page, offer routes, and contact form functionality after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app's root layout, backend health check, and all routes with lazy‑loaded pages and loading fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays login prompts or access‑denied UI for admin users and handles login, logout, and bootstrap/reset admin actions.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Buil: Shows hostname, mode, and build metadata with fallbacks and logs environment info to the console.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Implements a contact form with validation, bot‑detection timing, submission handling, and a success state.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Renders the contact section with email/WhatsApp info cards and includes the ContactForm.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Displays footer with social links, contact actions, branding, and the build environment indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Renders the hero banner with title, tagline, CTA buttons, and a scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the landing page with background imagery and sections for hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer while enabling hash-based scrolling.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Displays a grid of feature cards linking to offer pages, each with icons, emojis, descriptions, and styled interactions.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Renders an individual review card showing star rating, excerpt, and reviewer with animated styling.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Shows a reviews section containing multiple review cards from curated data and a TripAdvisor call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button directing users to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/components/offers/GetInTouc: Reusable CTA link that routes to the homepage and scrolls to the contact section via hash navigation.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Defines a list of country calling code options for use in forms or selectors.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Exports curated review data with reviewer names, ratings, and excerpts for display in the reviews section.
frontend/src/content/offersPosts.ts: Stores offer post metadata and long‑form sectioned content keyed by slug for offer detail pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrapAcce: Mutation hook to grant admin rights to the authenticated user and invalidate admin‑related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContactSubmis: Fetches all contact submissions via the actor with auth‑aware error handling and query control.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPasswordLogin: Empty file placeholder for admin password login logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminResetBootstra: Mutation hook to reset the admin bootstrap flag and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Performs a one-time backend connectivity and deployment info check, updating health state and logging diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and status handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Sets page SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, Twitter tags, and optional JSON-LD on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecaptchaV3.ts: Empty placeholder file for a future reCAPTCHA v3 hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToHashSectio: Scrolls smoothly to the DOM element matching the URL hash on mount or hash changes.
Submits contact form data to the backend with validation, spam detection handling, and error mapping.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, dark mode themes, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
Loads the admin submissions page for authenticated admins or shows access denied or loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContactSubmissi: Admin page that fetches and displays contact submissions, handles access control, and shows backend health diagnostics. Provides submission selection, refresh, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/pages/diagnostics/DraftVsLi: Public diagnostics page comparing draft vs live deployments, showing frontend metadata, backend health, and canister identity info. Includes copy‑to‑clipboard and guidance for interpreting environment mismatches.
frontend/src/pages/offers/ChooseYourOwnA: Offer article page rendering content for the 'Choose Your Own Adventure' package using SEO hooks and dynamic sections. Includes themed layout, navigation, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/FlexibleAsHell: Offer article page for the 'Flexible As Hell' package that loads post data, applies SEO, and displays sections with a CTA. Uses the same styled layout and navigation as other offer pages.
frontend/src/pages/offers/OffTheBeatenPa: Offer article page presenting the 'Off the Beaten Path' package with SEO metadata and dynamically rendered content sections. Includes consistent layout, styling, and a CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/PrivateAndPers: Offer article page for the 'Private and Personal' package, applying SEO and rendering structured content. Follows the shared offer layout with navigation and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StayYourWayPag: Renders the Stay Your Way offer page using dynamic post content, SEO setup, and a styled article layout with sections and CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StoriesAndBant: Renders the Stories and Banter offer page with dynamic post data, SEO initialization, and a formatted article layout and CTA.
frontend/src/types/recaptcha.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for recaptcha types.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Formats a bigint nanosecond timestamp into a human‑readable US locale date string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and handling hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, container settings, plugins, and custom keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and pending features related to admin bootstrapping recovery.
